name: misadministration
content:
misadministration noun [U]
(GIVING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of giving something, especially medicine or medical treatment, in a way that was not intended: the misadministration of drugs the misadministration of radiation
More examplesFewer examplesThe number of incidents involving the misadministration of drugs was alarmingly high.Hospitals are required to notify the patient of any misadministration within 15 days.The lawyer complained about the court's misadministration of justice.

misadministration noun [U]
(MANAGEMENT)
the act or process of managing an organization badly, wrongly, or in a way that was not intended: She has found evidence of misadministration by the industry regulators. We have seen misadministration and favouritism go unchecked.
More examplesFewer examplesThere was an article in the paper about the misadministration of nuclear power.
